thread.title: Neha Chatterjee: 'Darling Don't Cheat' has lot of stripping scenes
thread.title_full: Neha Chatterjee: 'Darling Don't Cheat' has lot of stripping scenes - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Neha Chatterjee: 'Darling Don't Cheat' has lot of stripping scenes
text:
Controversial thriller drama 'Darling Don't Cheat' is not only challenging and breaking the traditional mould but even the artistes are all geared up to take audience with their sexy and gripping avatars, says debutante actress Neha Chatterjee.
Speaking to IANS about her bold and sexy avatar, Neha said: "Film is quite bold with bold dialogues and I am part of a stripping scene. In fact I can even say that the film carries partial nudity also."
With 'Darling Don't Cheat' a gripping tale of dark intentions and reality, the artistes' involvement with the script have made them push their limits.
"Stripping scenes were not a demand of director, but a demand of the script. So when story demands something, I don't think there were any qualms about being uncomfortable," she said.
The film is a suspense thriller against the backdrop of a mean man brutalizing a group of girls by confining and asking them to strip. Neha plays an ambitious actress who is ready to go to any lengths to achieve success and fame.
The film, directed and produced by Rajkumar Hindusthani under the banner Fyeo Media Works, is slated to release on October 30.
